metadata.dc:author: Judez Fageda, J
metadata.dc:description: An evaluation of the influence of the mental state, culture and previous treatment on the perception of pain. The influence of these factors on the personal psychology. Comments are made on the different perception of pain according to age, education and culture.
metadata.dc:title: Efectos psicol√≥gicos del dolor.
[The psychological effects of pain].
